citations.narrative:
An enclosure containing one cat did not have an elevated resting surface. Another enclosure containing three cats had an
elevated resting surface with space for only two cats. The lack of elevated resting spaces does not allow for normal feline
behaviors nor offer an opportunity to avoid confrontation with other cats in the enclosure. Licensee must ensure that an
adequate number of elevated resting surfaces are provide to accommodate all the felines in the enclosure at the same
time to allow for normal feline behaviors, reduce stress and possible confrontation.
* To be corrected by: 7/5/2023

Three different enclosures (2 servals, 1 caracal) had kiddie pools/bowl that had a build up of green material on the bottom
and sides. There were also accumulations of this green organic build up floating in the water. The water contained within
was not potable. Water receptacles need to be kept clean and sanitary to reduce stagnant water, minimize pests and
harmful algae or bacterial growth. Licensee must ensure that all water receptacles are kept clean to allow for potable
water access.
* To be corrected by 6/14/2023 (corrected at time of inspection)
This inspection and verbal exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
